list.name: TUNING-FORK
list.description: Poco and all nearby allies heal x health per second for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Poco and all nearby allies heal x health per second for x seconds.

list.name: PROTECTIVE-TUNES
list.description: Removes active adverse effects from friendly Brawlers in a large area and gives a x second immunity.
list.descriptionHtml: Removes active adverse effects from friendly Brawlers in a large area and gives a x second immunity.
